track.name: Give Me One Reason
comments: Never heard this track until listening to a show on the BBC which focuses on a different American State each week,just happen to be driving every week that its on,the week it was on where Tracy comes from they chose to play this rather than any other,excellent to find this all these years after first buying her debut in 88
"Talkin' bout a revolution" is her best track; you must add that to your library if you haven't heard it. Awesome lyrics!
She's beautiful and so is her music. She's one of my all-time favorites.
i love this song it melts my heart to hear Tracy sing
Yes she is a girl for sure. A really sexy woman to boot!
Love, Love,Love this song. How do I put a picture on my profile? Anyone
im gon grow dreads so i can look just like this guy
Yea, give me one reason to stay here. Love Tracy.
I love her voice. And this song is amazing
old school dancing in a smoky back room. Love this song.
Oh the guitar on this track....gives me shivers......solid track.
Theres something incredibly sexy about this song
